author: Warhammer
description:
These merciless warriors are keen infiltrators, and sneaking up on their unsuspecting foes requires a subtle camouflage to get the job done. So obviously, a mission such as this deserves the brightest greens and yellows! 
In this video, Dan goes through how to paint a Striking Scorpion using contrast paints to lay down the bright colours needed for such sneaky tasks!

Here’s a list of the paints and tools we used in today’s video:

Contrast:
Aethermatic Blue
Bad Moon Yellow
Blood Angels Red
Kroxigor Scales
Iyanden Yellow
Mantis Warrior Green 
Striking Scorpion Green
Base:
Grey Seer
Layer: 
Dorn Yellow
Moot Green
Wild Rider Red
Tools:
Small Layer Brush STC
Small Base Brush STC
Medium Base Brush STC

If you're new to painting, our Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
title: How To Paint: Classic Striking Scorpions | Intermediate | Warhammer 40,000
